_header: Honour and joy health and prosperity
Note: First stanza abacbdd because scribe has written ‘certente’ instead of likely ‘certeyne’ in line 4.
Subjects: love letters; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: A letter to his heart’s sovereign — five stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
Honour and Joy helth and prosperyteBe vnto yow my hartys
                    souueraynIn humble wyse I lowly Recommend meVnto youre good grace for
                    verrey certente…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…That truly and god there ys no remedyWithout your comfort but
                    mercylese to dy Explicit &cetera
